compatibility.notes: Permissive license, compatible with most open-source licenses. No special requirements for distribution or modification.

key_requirements: Include the Blue Oak Model License (version 1.0.0) text in every copy of the software

obligations: Ensure that everyone who gets a copy of any part of the software from you, with or without changes, also gets the text of this license or a link to <https://blueoakcouncil.org/license/1.0.0>
